text: AMEOS group is a Swiss hospital group which runs 68 facilities in Germany and Austria including a significant amount of public healthcare. It was set up in 2002 in Zurich by physician Axel Paeger. AMEOS identifies and buys failing hospitals. Major investors are Quadriga Capital and The Carlyle Group. Sir David Dalton’s report on new opportunities for providers of NHS care contains a case study of AMEOS. See also AMEOS article in German Wikipedia ==References== ==External links== * Category:Health care companies of Switzerland Category:2002 establishments in Switzerland Category:Companies based in Zürich
title: AMEOS group
